Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.gameStates

Class GameSession

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.gameStates.GameSessionObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.gameStates.GameSession
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameSessionForTest
public class GameSession
extends GameSessionObservable
This is the "central" class of the game. It stores all the data about the states, that is all the turns of the game, and about the game (current player and current state). It is also the main access to the database of the game, in which the players, cards, workers and cells data are stored. In that way the controller can access them, compute with the interaction of players and call the handlers to change the state of the database (model).

  • Field Summary

      Parameters:

    • sendEndingMessage

      public void sendEndingMessage​(EndGameMessage messageToLosers, EndGameMessage messageForTheWinner, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> nicksExcluded)
      This method calls the super method and then switches to false the boolean "active" to stop the thread.
      Overrides:
      sendEndingMessage in class GameSessionObservable
      Parameters:
      messageToLosers - The message that has to be delivered to all the losers of the game.
      messageForTheWinner - The message that has to be delivered to the winner of the game.
      nicksExcluded - All the nicknames of the players excluded from receiving the "messageForTheLosers".

    • sendBroadCast

      public void sendBroadCast​(EndGameMessage endGameMessage, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> nicksExcluded)

      Overrides:
      sendBroadCast in class GameSessionObservable
      Parameters:
      endGameMessage - The message to be sent.

    • sendRequest

      public <T extends ClientMessage> T sendRequest​(ServerMessage message, java.lang.String addressee, java.lang.Class<T> typeExpected) throws GameEndedException
      This method is used to send a request to the client and to wait for a response.
      Overrides:
      sendRequest in class GameSessionObservable
      Type Parameters:
      T - A sub-type of ClientMessage.
      Parameters:
      message - The request message sent.
      addressee - The player who has to receive the message.
      typeExpected - The type of message that the caller is expecting.
      Returns:
      a response from the client.
      Throws:
      GameEndedException - if the client has disconnected while he was asked by this method.
